Posts.EditableText: Hello everyone, I’m new on Textadventures and I’m trying to create a gamebook. Unfortunately I cannot add sounds and music: I load .mp3 and .wav files, but they don't work. I am using the desktop version on tablet, is this the problem? Thanks
